npp-plugins.description: Pork to Sausage is a plugin which is capable to pass any selected text to any command line program as input and to takes the output (the result of program) to replace the selected text.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: MIME plugin for Notepad++ implements several main functionalities defined in MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions).
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: NppConverter is a ASCII<->Hex converter plugin for Notepad++.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: Select 'N' Launch's basic feature is get your selected text, save it as file with the extension you customized in the system temporary directory, then call system to open it with the extension associated program.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: Notepad++ Plugin Demo is written from Notepad++ Plugin Template to demostrate the usage of plugin API.
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: This template is done for making plugin development as easy and simple as possible. 4 steps and it's done - Even your grandmom can do it!
npp-plugins.author: Don HO

npp-plugins.description: Notepad++ plugin for CS-Script integration. It implements a real C# Intellisense solution based on CS-Script and Roslyn. It also allows loading, executing modifying and debugging C# scripts in a way very similar to the Visual Studio C# projects support. This includes referencing assemblies and other scripts, code formatting, adding missing namespaces and intercepting Debug and Console output.
npp-plugins.author: Oleg Shilo
